channel.title: Cappuccino on Everything is Gray
channel.description: Recent content in Cappuccino on Everything is Gray

item.title: Cappuccino Web Framework
item.description: So lately I’ve been playing around with the Cappuccino web framework and a nifty little programming language called Objective-J. The Cappuccino framework allows you to create desktop class applications for the browser, and gives you the ability to run these applications on the desktop, (similar to Adobe AIR). One of the many benefits of being able to create applications that run on the desktop is having the ability to run the application while offline.
